author: Electricks94
body:
This PR adds `MultiCollection.h` to `DataFormats/Common` as an alias for `std::vector<RefProd<T>>`. Then MultiCollections for `PFRecHitCollection` and `HGCRecHitCollection` are introduced as product of the `RecHitMapProducer` and comsumed by other producers to create a `MultiSpan` on the fly. This workflow has two advantages

1. Memory copies are avoided
2. The order of the MultiCollections is defined in one location (see [issue 48526](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/48526#issuecomment-3449942861) )

**PR validation:**

Workflow 29688.0


FYI @felicepantaleo @leobeltra
title: Define MultiCollections for HGCRecHitCollection and PFRecHitCollection
